name: Friends Play Pool
description:
Why it's awesome:
1. Multiplayer - 2 people online
2. At home on your couch - connect multiple controllers and let the fun begin
3. Steam Deck - on a road trip? Bring your pool table with you. Let your friend shoot once it's their turn

Gameplay features:
1. Disable / Enable HUD with that one button that's not START
2. No menu needed, game starts as soon as you open it
3. Apply spin to the white ball - do you even know what it does?
4. Hold overview button - you'll get to see where all the balls are
